title: Program Catalog Mechatronics Engineering

vision_mission.slu_vision: An excellent missionary and transformative educational institution developing locally responsive, globally competitive, empowered individuals guided by Christian values.
vision_mission.school_vision: An exemplary engineering and architecture school committed to creative, competent instruction, research, and community service grounded in Christian ethics.

educational_objectives: Demonstrate technical competence with consideration of technical, ethical, societal, and environmental aspects.
Apply Christian values: honesty, service, dedication, and moral responsibility.
Engage in graduate studies, research, and innovation.
Address national social, technical, and business challenges.
learning_outcomes: Apply math, science, and engineering to solve complex problems.
Conduct investigations using research-based knowledge and experimentation.
Design systems or processes considering safety, health, and environment.
Work effectively individually or in diverse/multidisciplinary teams.
Analyze and synthesize engineering literature and data.
Communicate effectively with technical and general audiences.
Evaluate the environmental and societal impact of engineering solutions.
Address cultural, legal, and health-related issues in engineering.
Use modern engineering tools and IT with awareness of limitations.
Apply project management and economic principles in engineering.
Embody Christian values in professional practice.

notes: Max load (graduating): Regular load + 6 units (sem), +3 units (short term)
Year level based on 70% of enrolled subjects

freshmen: Must pass SLU College Entrance Exam (SLU-CEE)
Must qualify within course slot quota
transferees: Must take Qualifying Exam (QE) + Personality Test & Interview
Foreign transferees: Must also pass English Proficiency Test (EPT)

graduate_students.masters: Must hold a recognized Bachelor’s degree
graduate_students.doctorate: Must hold a related Master’s degree

foreign_students: Apply at least 6 months before term
Must arrive 4 weeks prior to classes for EPT, SLU-CEE/QE, Personality Test
Must secure a valid Student Visa

tuition_and_fees.note: Fees subject to change without prior notice
